setting.msg-restart-required: Promjena ove opcije zahtijeva ponovno pokretanje.

editor.name: Urednik
editor.option-spellcheck-description: Uključuje provjeru pravopisa. Trenutno radi samo za engleski (US).
editor.spellcheck-languages-mac-description: Na macOS-u će se izvorna provjera pravopisa automatski prilagoditi jeziku koji koristite.
editor.spellcheck-dict-empty: Rječnik za provjeru pravopisa je prazan.
editor.option-show-inline-title-description: Prikaži naziv datoteke kao naslov koji se može uređivati zajedno s ostalim sadržajem.
editor.option-readable-line-description: Ograniči maksimalnu duljinu retka. Prikazuje manje sadržaja na zaslonu, ali čini duge odlomke jednostavnijim za čitanje.
editor.option-strict-line-break-description: U načinu pregleda (Preview mode) ignoriraj pojedinačne prijelome redaka prema Markdown specifikaciji. Isključi ovu opciju kako bi pojedinačni prijelomi redaka bili vidljivi u pregledu.
editor.option-properties-in-document-descriptio: Odaberi kako će svojstva biti prikazana u uređivaču. Odaberi "Izvorni kod" za prikaz svojstava u YAML formatu.
editor.option-auto-pair-markdown-description: Automatski upari simbole za podebljanje, kurziv, isticanje, precrtavanje i kod.
editor.option-smart-indent-lists-description: Automatski se brine o uvlačenju i oznakama za popis.
editor.option-fold-heading-description: Omogućuje sklapanje svega ispod naslova poglavlja.
editor.option-fold-indent-description: Omogućuje sklapanje dijela s istom razinom uvlake, poput popisa.
editor.option-default-new-tab-view-description: Zadani prikaz u kojem se otvara nova Markdown kartica.
editor.option-open-tab-in-foreground-descriptio: Kada otvorite poveznicu u novoj kartici, odmah se se prabaci na nju.
editor.option-default-editing-mode-description: Zadani način uređivanja u kojem otvaramo novu karticu.
editor.option-show-line-number-description: Prikaži broj retka u bočnoj margini.
editor.option-indentation-guide-description: Prikaži okomite linije s poveznicama između elemenata u popisu radi vizualnog vođenja.
editor.option-use-tabs-description: Koristi tabove za uvlake kada pritisneš tipku "Tab" na tipokovnici. Isključi ovu opciju za korištenje razmaka (space)
editor.option-tab-size-description: Broj razmaka kojima je jedan tab ekvivalentan.
editor.option-rtl-description: Postavlja smjer prikaza teksta u bilješkama s desna na lijevo.
editor.option-auto-convert-html-description: Automatski pretvara HTML u Markdown prilikom lijepljenja ili povlačenja i ispuštanja s web stranica. Koristite Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+V za lijepljenje bez konverzije.
editor.option-vim-key-bindings-description: Omogućuje korištenje Vim tipkovničkih prečaca u uređivaču izvornog koda.
editor.option-vim-key-bindings-mobile: Na mobilnim uređajima ova postavka je omogućena samo na pojedinačnim uređajima i ne sinkronizira se putem konfiguracijske datoteke.
editor.option-reindex-vault-description: Ponovna izrada predmemorije može trajati od nekoliko sekundi do nekoliko minuta, ovisno o veličini vašeg spremišta.
editor.label-confirm-enable-vim: Potvrdi ulazak u Vim način rada
editor.label-vim-warning: Vim način rada namijenjen je učinkovitom uređivanju teksta, ali može biti prilično neintuitivan. Ako niste upoznati s Vimom, odabir ove opcije može djelovati kao da je Obsidian prestao raditi.
editor.label-vim-test: Kako biste potvrdili da poznajete rad u Vimu, unesite naredbu za izlazak iz Vima bez spremanja u polje ispod:
editor.msg-vim-mode-enabled: Naredba je točna. Vim način rada je sada omogućen.
editor.msg-vim-mode-not-enabled: Naredba nije točna. Vim način rada ostaje onemogućen radi kako bismo vas zaštitili.
editor.msg-vim-mode-please-enter-command: Molimo unesite naredbu za omogućavanje Vim načina rada

file.name: Datoteke i poveznice
file.option-confirm-file-deletion-description: Whether you want to get prompted to confirm file deletion.
file.option-delete-destination-description: Odaberi kamo će ići datoteke nakon brisanja.
file.option-always-update-links-description: Odaberi hoće li se poveznice automatski ažurirati nakon preimenovanja datoteke.
file.option-new-note-location-description: Odaberi lokaciju za nove bilješke. Postavke plugina mogu ovo promijeniti.
file.option-choice-current-folder: Ista mapa u kojoj se nalazi datoteka
file.option-new-file-folder-path-description: Nove bilješke će se spremati u ovu mapu. Postavke plugina mogu ovo promijeniti.
file.option-use-wiki-links-description: Automatski generiraj Wikilinkove za [[poveznice]] i ![[slike]] umjesto Markdown poveznica. Isključi ako želiš koristiti Markdown poveznice.
file.option-show-unsupported-files-descriptio: Prikaži datoteke svih ekstenzija, čak i ako ih Obsidian ne može otvoriti. Tako ih barem možeš linkati i vidjeti u Exploreru datoteku te u brzom izborniku (Quick Switcher).
file.option-link-autocompleted-format-descrip: Odaberi format koji će se koristiti za automatsko generiranje internih poveznica.
file.option-new-attachment-location-descripti: Mjesto gdje će se spremati novododani privici (attachments).
file.option-attachment-folder-path-descriptio: Novi privici će se spremati ovdje. To uključuje slike dodane povlačenjem, lijepljenjem i audio snimke.
file.option-attachment-subfolder-path-descrip: Ako se datoteka nalazi u "vault/mapa", , a podmapa je postavljena na "attachments", privici će biti spremljeni u "vault/mapa/attachments".
file.option-excluded-files-desc: Isključene datoteke će biti skrivene ili manje vidlijve na različitim mjestima poput Quick Switchera, Graph View i preporukama poveznica.
file.label-no-excluded-filters-applied: Nijedan filtar isključenja trenutno nije aktivan. Dodaj ga dolje.
file.label-excluded-filters-applied: Sljedeći filtri su trenutno aktivni i isključuju određene datoteke:
file.option-uri-callbacks-desc: Omogući korištenje x-callback-url kroz x-success ili x-error pri obradi Obsidian URI-ja.

appearance.name: Izgled
appearance.option-base-theme-description: Odaberi zadanu shemu boja za Obsidian.
appearance.option-accent-color-description: Odaberi naglašenu boju koja će se koristiti u cijeloj aplikaciji.
appearance.option-interface-font-description: Postavi osnovni font za cijeli Obsidian.
appearance.option-zoom-level-description: Kontrolira opću razinu zumiranja na razini cijele aplikacije.
appearance.option-text-font-description: Postavi font za prikaz i uređivanje teksta.
appearance.option-monospace-font-description: Postavi font za kodne blokove i metapodatke (frontmatter).
appearance.label-no-custom-font-set: Trenutno nije primijenjen nijedan prilagođeni font. Dodaj ga dolje.
appearance.label-font-applied: Prvi font s popisa koji je dostupan u tvom sustavu bit će primijenjen.
appearance.msg-font-not-found: Ovaj font nije pronađen na tvom sustavu.
appearance.msg-font-found: Ovaj font je pronađen na tvom sustavu.
appearance.option-community-themes-description: Pregledaj i koristi sjajne teme koje je izradila zajednica.
appearance.option-font-size-description: Veličina fonta u pikselima koja utječe na uređivač i prikaz.
appearance.option-font-size-action-description: Prilagodi veličinu fonta pomoću Ctrl + Scroll ili geste zumiranja na trackpadu uređaja.
appearance.option-manage-themes-description: Upravljaj instaliranim temama i pregledaj teme iz zajednice.
appearance.option-native-menus-desc: Izbornici u aplikaciji će biti podudarni s izbornicima operacijskog sustava i neće biti pod utjecajem tvoje teme.
appearance.label-no-css-snippets-found: Nisu pronađeni CSS snippeti u mapi s isječcima.
appearance.option-frame-description: Određuje stil naslovne trake prozora u Obsidianu. Zahtjeva ponovno pokretanje aplikacije za primjenu.
appearance.option-configure-ribbon-desc: Konfiguriraj koje će se naredbe prikazati na vrpci za brzi pristup unutar navigacijske trake.
appearance.option-mobile-quick-ribbon-item-desc: Dodir stavke na vrpci za brzi pristup u navigacijskoj traci aktivira opciju. Dodirni i zadrži če i dalje prikazati izbornik.
appearance.option-show-ribbon-desc: Prikaži okomitu alatnu traku sa strane prozora.
appearance.label-modal-configuration-desc: Odaberi koje će stavke biti aktivne u vrpci za brzi pristup. Povuci i ispusti za promjenu redoslijeda.
appearance.option-show-view-header-desc: Prikaži zaglavlje na vrhu svake kartice.

hotkeys.name: Tipkovnički prečaci
hotkeys.tooltip-hotkey-single-conflict: Ovaj prečac je u sukobu s "{{command}}"
hotkeys.tooltip-hotkey-multiple-conflicts: Ovaj prečac je u sukobu s {{count}} naredbe/i

about.name: Općenito
about.label-manual-update-required: Za podršku korištenje najnovijih funkcionalnosti i sigurnosnih zakrpa, Obsidian treba napraviti veliku nadogradnju instalacijskog programa. Ručno preuzmi i ponovno instaliraj Obsidian.
about.label-new-version-ready: Nova verzija je spremna za instalaciju.
about.option-auto-update-description: Isključi ovu opciju ako ne želiš da aplikacija provjerava ažuriranja.
about.option-check-slow-startup: Obavijesti ako pokretanje sustava traje dulje od očekivanog
about.option-check-slow-startup-description: Dijagnosticiraj probleme s aplikacijom i provjeri što usporava učitavanje.
about.option-insider-build-description: Automatski ažuriraj na testne verzije kako bi isprobao nove značajke i funkcionalnosti. Imaj na umu da su ove verzije eksperimentalne i mogu biti nestabilne.
about.option-hw-acceleration-description: Omogućuje hardversku akceleraciju kako bi Obsidian glatko radio koristeći tvoj grafički procesor (GPU).
about.option-hw-acceleration-warning: Ako isključiš ovu opciju, performanse aplikacije bit će značajno smanjene.
about.option-config-location-description: Koristi drugu mapu za konfiguraciju umjesto zadane. Mora započeti s točkom ispred naziva.
about.option-config-location-warning: Lokacija konfiguracijske mape mora biti validan naziv mape koji započinje točkom.
about.label-commercial-license-info: Registrirano na "{{company}}" za {{seats}} korisnika. Vrijedi do {{expiry}}.
about.option-catalyst-desc: Trenutno imaš {{tier}} Catalyst licencu. Hvala ti na podršci!
about.option-catalyst-desc-no-license: Trenutno nemaš Catalyst licencu. Catalyst licenca je jednokratna donacija za podršku razvoja Obsidiana.
about.label-add-own-language: Pogledaj kako dodati svoj jezik u Obsidian.

account.name: Račun
account.option-your-account-desc-no-login: Trenutno nisi prijavljen. Račun je potreban samo za Obsidian Sync, Obsidian Publish i Catalyst testne verzije.
account.option-commercial-license-desc: Ako koristiš Obsidian u komercijalne svrhe, možda ćeš trebati komercijalnu licencu.
account.message-login-failed: Prijava nije uspjela, provjeri svoj e-mail i lozinku.
account.mfa-verification-failed: 2FA kod nije točan, provjeri svoju autentifikacijsku aplikaciju.

core-plugin.option-search-plugin-description: Filtriraj plugine po nazivu ili opisu.

third-party-plugin.name: Plugini trećih strana
third-party-plugin.option-restricted-mode-description: Ograničeni način rada je isključen. Uključi ga kako bi onemogućio community plugine.
third-party-plugin.option-browse-community-plugins-descript: Pregledaj i instaliraj plugine trećih strana koje je izradila naša sjajna zajednica.
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-description-1: Community plugini, poput bilo kojeg drugog softvera koji instaliraš, mogu potencijalno uzrokovati probleme s integritetom podataka i sigurnošću.
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-description-2: Sigurnost plugina nam je važna. Evo što radimo:
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-description-3: Unatoč našim naporima i dalje postoji mala mogućnost da se community plugin ponaša nepredviđeno.
third-party-plugin.label-code-review-desc: Plugini prolaze početnu reviziju koda od strane našeg tima prije nego što se pojave u trgovini.
third-party-plugin.label-open-source-desc: Većina plugina je open-source na GitHubu, tako da možeš pregledati kod.
third-party-plugin.label-peer-audit-desc: Imamo veliku zajednicu developera koji brinu jedni o drugima.
third-party-plugin.label-report-mechanism-desc: Pratimo i uklanjamo neispravne plugine nakon prijave korisnika.
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-disable-confi: Želiš li isključiti Ograničeni način rada kako bi omogućio community plugine? Preporučujemo da napraviš sigurnosne kopije svojih podataka prije nego što to učiniš.
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author-description-1: Ovaj vault otvaraš prvi put, a dolazi s nekim pluginima.
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author-description-2: Ako si ovaj vault dobio od nekog drugog, imaj na umu da plugini nepoznatog podrijetla mogu predstavljati sigurnosni rizik.
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author-description-3: Ako ne vjeruješ u potpunosti autoru ovog vaulta, preporučujemo da ostaneš u Ograničenom načinu rada kako se plugini u ovom spremištu ne bi pokrenuli.
third-party-plugin.button-dont-trust-author: Pregledaj vault u Ograničenom načinu rada
third-party-plugin.label-uninstall-plugin-confirmation: Jesi li siguran da želiš deinstalirati ovaj plugin? Ovo će obrisati njegovu mapu.
third-party-plugin.option-search-installed-plugin-descripti: Filtriraj instalirane plugine prema nazivu ili opisu.
third-party-plugin.label-donate-modal-text1: Razvojni programeri plugina su volonteri iz zajednice koji iz strasti stvaraju nevjerojatne stvari. Ako ti je ovaj plugin koristan, razmisli o financijskoj podršci njegovom razvoju.
third-party-plugin.label-donate-modal-text2: 100% tvoje donacije ide programeru plugina; Obsidian ne uzima nikakav postotak. Platforma za financiranje koju odaberu može naplatiti naknadu.

mobile-toolbar.name: Mobilna alatna traka
mobile-toolbar.option-configure-quick-action: Konfiguriraj brzu radnju na mobilnom uređaju
mobile-toolbar.option-configure-quick-action-descriptio: Odaberi naredbu koja će se pokrenuti povlačenjem prema dolje s vrha zaslona. Trenutna naredba je postavljena na "{{command}}".
mobile-toolbar.option-add-command-description: Odaberi bilo koju globalnu naredbu za dodavanje u alatnu traku.

print-modal.title: Izvoz u PDF
print-modal.caption: Izvezi "{{filename}}" u PDF s postavkama u nastavku.

interface.empty-sidebar: Bočna traka je prazna, pokušaj povući prozor ovdje.
interface.msg-plugin-error: Plugin "{{plugin}}" je naišao na pogrešku prilikom učitavanja
interface.msg-file-changed: "{{file}}" je eksterno izmijenjena, automatski se spajaju promjene.
interface.msg-switched-to-read: Zadani prikaz je promijenjen u način čitanja.
interface.msg-switched-to-edit: Zadani prikaz je promijenjen u način uređivanja.
interface.msg-upgrade-installer: Za korištenje ove značajke ponovno instaliraj najnoviju verziju s naše web stranice.
interface.msg-desktop-only-feature: Ova značajka je dostupna samo u desktop aplikaciji.
interface.msg-indexing:
Obsidian indeksira tvoje spremište...
Ovo bi se trebalo dogoditi samo jednom.
Neke značajke možda neće biti dostupne dok se postupak ne dovrši.
interface.msg-sandbox-vault:
Ovo je sandbox vault.
Promjene napravljene u njemu bit će izgubljene.
interface.msg-tab-busy: Ovaj tab je trenutno zauzet, pokušaj ponovno kasnije.

empty-state.unknown-pane-desc: Plugin koji je stvorio ovaj prozor ({{type}}) više ne postoji

menu.edit-view: Uredi (Ctrl/Cmd+klik za uređivanje u novom prozoru)

tooltip.not-created-yet: Još nije stvoreno, odaberi za izradu

start-screen.option-open-folder-as-vault-description: Odaberi postojeću mapu s Markdown datotekama...
start-screen.option-create-vault-description: Stvori novo Obsidian spremište (vault) unutar mape.
start-screen.option-connect-obsidian-sync-description: Postavi sinkronizirano spremište (vault) s postojećim udaljenim spremištem.
start-screen.option-new-vault-location-description: Odaberi lokaciju za svoje novo spremište (vault).
start-screen.label-new-vault-location-preview: Tvoje novo spremište bit će smješteno u:
start-screen.option-reveal-vault-in-explorer: Prikaži spremište u Exploreru unutar sustava
start-screen.msg-error-rename-exists: Već postoji spremište s tim imenom.
start-screen.msg-error-nested: Ne možeš premjestiti spremište u vlastitu podmapu.
start-screen.msg-error-rename-open: Ne možeš preimenovati trenutno otvoreno spremište.
start-screen.msg-error-move-exists: Već postoji spremište na odredišnoj lokaciji.
start-screen.msg-error-move-open: Ne možeš premjestiti trenutno otvoreno spremište.
start-screen.msg-empty-vault-name: Naziv spremišta ne može biti prazan.
start-screen.msg-trailing-dot-vault-name: Naziv spremišta ne može završavati točkom.
start-screen.msg-failed-to-create-vault-at-location: Nije moguće stvoriti spremište na zadanoj lokaciji. Provjeri lokaciju i dozvole.
start-screen.msg-error-remove-current-open-vault: Ne možeš ukloniti trenutno otvoreno spremište.
start-screen.option-connect-vault-desc: Stvori sinkronizirano spremište na ovom uređaju.
start-screen.tooltip-own-vault: Ovo je udaljeno spremište u tvom vlasništvu.
start-screen.tooltip-shared-vault: Ovo je udaljeno spremište podijeljeno s tobom.

starter-content.welcome-file-content:
Ovo je tvoje novo *spremište (vault)*.

Zapiši bilješku, [[izradi poveznicu]] ili isprobaj [Importer](https://help.obsidian.md/Plugins/Importer)!

Kad budeš spreman, obriši ovu bilješku i prilagodi spremište vlastitim potrebama.

start-up.obsidian-load-error: Dogodila se pogreška prilikom učitavanja Obsidiana.
start-up.button-reload-app-in-safe-mode: Ponovno učitaj aplikaciju u sigurnom načinu (safe mode)
start-up.msg-plugin-hang: Plugin "{{plugin}}" se učitava duže od očekivanog.

mobile.msg-back-again-to-exit: Pritisni još jednom natrag za izlaz.

help-screen.label-official-help-site-desc: Pročitaj službenu dokumentaciju pomoći za Obsidian, dostupnu na više jezika.
help-screen.label-discord-chat-desc: Discord je najbolje mjesto za razgovor s iskusnim korisnicima Obsidiana iz cijelog svijeta.
help-screen.label-forum-desc: Pomažite jedni drugima, predlažite nove značajke i funkcionalnosti, prijavljujte greške i sudjelujte u raspravama o upravljanju znanjem.
help-screen.label-sandbox-vault-desc: Istražuj i eksperimentiraj s različitim značajkama. Imaj na umu da promjene neće biti spremljene.

commands.open-cursor-link-in-new-tab: Otvori poveznicu ispod kursora u novom tabu
commands.open-cursor-link-in-new-window: Otvori poveznicu ispod kursora u novom prozoru
commands.search-replace-current-file: Pretraži i zamijeni u trenutnoj datoteci
commands.toggle-default-new-tab-mode: Prikaži/sakrij zadani način rada za nove tabove
commands.move-to-new-window: Premjesti trenutni prozor u novi prozor
commands.open-in-new-window: Otvori trenutni prozor u novom prozoru

dialogue.label-confirm-update-link-to-file: Želite li ažurirati interne poveznice koje vode do ove datoteke?
dialogue.label-confirm-deletion: Jeste li sigurni da želite obrisati "{{filename}}"?
dialogue.label-move-to-system-trash: Datoteka će biti premještena u koš za smeće vašeg sustava.
dialogue.label-move-to-vault-trash: Datoteka će biti premještena u Obsidianov otpad, koji se nalazi u skrivenoj mapi ".trash" unutar vašeg spremišta.
dialogue.label-delete-folder-warning: Ako nastavite, sve datoteke unutar ove mape bit će obrisane.
dialogue.label-existing-backlink: Trenutno postoji {{links}} poveznica koje vode na ovu bilješku.
dialogue.label-existing-backlink_plural: Trenutno postoji {{links}} poveznica koje vode na ovu bilješku.

file-explorer.name: File Explorer
file-explorer.desc: Pregledaj sve datoteke u svom spremištu.
file-explorer.action-create-note-in-current-tab: Izradi novu bilješku u trenutnom tabu
file-explorer.action-reveal-active-file: Prikaži aktivnu datoteku u File Exploreru
file-explorer.action-new-folder-with-count: Nova mapa s odabranim stavkama ({{count}} stavka)
file-explorer.action-new-folder-with-count_plural: Nova mapa s odabranim stavkama ({{count}} stavki)
file-explorer.msg-invalid-characters: Naziv datoteke ne može sadržavati sljedeće znakove:
file-explorer.msg-unsafe-characters: Poveznice neće raditi s nazivima datoteka koji sadrže sljedeće znakove:
file-explorer.msg-file-already-exists: Datoteka s ovim nazivom već postoji.
file-explorer.msg-empty-file-name: Naziv datoteke ne može biti prazan.
file-explorer.msg-bad-dotfile: Naziv datoteke ne smije započeti točkom.
file-explorer.msg-set-attachment-folder: Privitci će se od sada spremati u "{{path}}".

search.name: Pretraživanje
search.desc: Pretraži sve bilješke po ključnoj riječi.
search.label-match-case: Pazi na velika i mala slova
search.label-match-any: Podudara se s bilo kojim od:
search.label-case-sensitive: Osjetljivo na velika i mala slova
search.label-case-insensitive: Nije osjetljivo na velika i mala slova
search.option-show-path-description: Prikaži cijelu putanju datoteke umjesto samo naziva.
search.option-link-style-description: Opcionalno pretvori svaki rezultat u poveznicu.
search.option-list-prefix-description: Opcionalno dodaj prefiks popisa uz svaki rezultat pretrage.
search.label-line-option-description: Pretraži ključne riječi u istom retku
search.label-section-option-description: Pretraži ključne riječi pod istim naslovom

quick-switcher.name: Quick Switcher
quick-switcher.desc: Brzo pretraži i otvori datoteke bez korištenja miša. Aktiviraj s Ctrl/Cmd+O.
quick-switcher.label-no-note-create-new: Nema pronađenih bilješki. Pritisni Enter za izradu nove.
quick-switcher.prompt-type-file-name: Upiši naziv datoteke za prebacivanje ili izradu...
quick-switcher.tooltip-not-created-yet: Još nije izrađeno, odaberi za izradu
quick-switcher.option-show-existing-only-description: Odaberi hoće li se prikazivati i poveznice na datoteke koje još nisu izrađene.
quick-switcher.option-show-attachments-desc: Prikaži privitke poput slika, videa i PDF-ova.
quick-switcher.option-show-all-file-types-desc: Prikaži sve datoteke, uključujući one koje Obsidian ne može otvoriti. Datoteka će se otvoriti u zadanoj aplikaciji za taj tip datoteke.

graph-view.name: Prikaz grafa
graph-view.option-depth-description: Prikaži čvorove unutar ovog broja poveznica
graph-view.option-show-tags-description: Tagovi su povezani s datotekama koje ih sadrže
graph-view.option-show-existing-files-only-descript: Ako je uključeno, poveznice prema nepostojećim datotekama neće biti prikazane
graph-view.option-show-orphans-description: Prikaži datoteke koje nisu povezane s niti jednom drugom datotekom
graph-view.option-show-arrows-description: Prikaži strelice kada je prikaz uvećan
graph-view.tooltip-click-to-change-drag-to-reorder:
Klikni za promjenu boje
Povuci za promjenu redoslijeda grupa

backlinks.name: Povratne veze
backlinks.desc: Prikaži broj povratnih veza u statusnoj traci.
backlinks.action-open-for-current: Otvori povratne veze za trenutnu datoteku
backlinks.option-backlink-in-document-desc: Prikaži povratne veze u dokumentu prema zadanim postavkama prilikom otvaranja novih okana.

outgoing-links.name: Odlazne poveznice
outgoing-links.desc: Prikaži odlazne poveznice i otkrij nepovezane reference drugih bilješki u trenutnoj bilješci.
outgoing-links.action-open-for-current: Otvori odlazne poveznice za trenutnu datoteku

tag-pane.name: Okno tagova
tag-pane.desc: Prikazuje sve vaše tagove zajedno s brojem njihovih pojavljivanja.

properties.name: Prikaz svojstava (properties)
properties.msg-merge-properties-warning-desc: U slučaju sukoba, vrijednosti će biti spojene ili će se koristiti vrijednost iz “{{oldKey}}”.

page-preview.name: Pregled stranice
page-preview.desc: Pregledaj bilješku prilikom prelaska mišem preko interne poveznice. Ctrl/Cmd + prelazak mišem u načinu uređivanja.
page-preview.label-empty-note: "{{linktext}}" još nije izrađeno. Kliknite za izradu.
page-preview.label-missing-footote: Fusnota {{id}} nije pronađena. Kliknite za izradu.
page-preview.label-source-search: Pretraživanje, povratne veze i odlazne poveznice
page-preview.label-require-mod: Zahtijeva {{key}} za aktiviranje pregleda stranice prilikom prelaska mišem

bookmarks.name: Bookmarks
bookmarks.desc: Zabilježi često korištene datoteke i pretrage.
bookmarks.msg-no-search-query: Nema upita za pretragu za zabilješku.

custom-css.name: Custom CSS
custom-css.desc: Reads "obsidian.css" in the vault and applies it.
custom-css.label-no-readme: This theme did not provide a README file.
custom-css.msg-load-error: Could not load community themes, please check your network.
custom-css.msg-now-using-theme: You're now using {{title}} as your CSS theme.

command-palette.name: Command palette
command-palette.desc: Type a command to invoke it. No need to use the UI or remember the shortcut.
command-palette.option-add-new-pin-description: Pinned commands will appear at the top of all commands when no search query is present.

markdown-format-importer.name: Markdown format importer
markdown-format-importer.desc: Convert Markdown from other apps to Obsidian format.
markdown-format-importer.zettelkasten-link-fixer-description: Fixes "[[UID]]" links to full "[[UID File Name]]".
markdown-format-importer.zettelkasten-link-beautifier-description: Fixes "[[UID]]" links and also beautify them "[[UID File Name|File Name]]".
markdown-format-importer.msg-all-files-warning: Warning: the importer will convert all the files in your vault, not just the current file.
markdown-format-importer.msg-override-files-warning: Your files will be overwritten. Back up all your files before attempting conversion.

daily-notes.name: Daily notes
daily-notes.desc: Open today's daily note, or create one if not present.
daily-notes.msg-fail-format: Failed to create daily note. "{{format}}" is not a valid format.
daily-notes.msg-fail-folder: Failed to create daily note. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
daily-notes.msg-fail-template-file: Failed to create daily note. Template file "{{template}}" not found.
daily-notes.msg-no-previous: There's no daily note before this one.
daily-notes.msg-no-next: There's no daily note after this one.
daily-notes.label-syntax-live-preview: Here is what it will look like:
daily-notes.option-new-file-location-description: The folder path to create the new daily note.
daily-notes.option-template-description: The file path to use as template.
daily-notes.option-open-on-start-description: Open your daily note automatically whenever you open this vault.

unique-note-creator.name: Unique note creator
unique-note-creator.desc: Create notes with unique timestamp prefixes, for workflows like zettelkasten or slip box.
unique-note-creator.option-new-file-location-description: The folder path to create the new unique note.
unique-note-creator.msg-folder-not-found: Failed to create unique note. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
unique-note-creator.option-template-file-description: The file path to use as template.
unique-note-creator.msg-template-file-not-found: Failed to create unique note. Template file "{{template}}" not found.
unique-note-creator.msg-failed-to-generate: Failed to generate a unique note with the format "{{format}}

random-note.name: Random note
random-note.desc: Opens a random note. Useful for reviewing and discovering.

outline.name: Outline
outline.desc: Displays the outline of the current file or linked pane.
outline.action-open-for-current: Open outline of the current file

word-count.name: Word count
word-count.desc: Show word count in the status bar.

slides.name: Slides
slides.desc: Present from Markdown. Use "---" to separate slides.

audio-recorder.name: Audio recorder
audio-recorder.desc: Record audio and save as attachment.
audio-recorder.msg-access-denied: Microphone access was denied, please enable it from the preference pane.
audio-recorder.msg-pending-grant: Please grant microphone permission to start recording.

open-with-default-app.name: Open in default app
open-with-default-app.desc: Add button to open current file in the default app.

templates.name: Templates
templates.desc: Insert template content from a folder of template files.
templates.option-template-folder-location-descript: Files in this folder will be available as templates.
templates.option-template-date-format-description: {{date}} in the template file will be replaced with this value.
templates.option-template-date-format-description2: You can also use {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}} to override the format once.
templates.option-template-time-format-description: {{time}} in the template file will be replaced with this value.
templates.option-template-time-format-description2: You can also use {{time:HH:mm}} to override the format once.
templates.msg-fail-invalid-folder: Failed to list templates. Template folder is invalid.
templates.msg-fail-folder-not-found: Failed to list templates. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
templates.msg-fail-invalid-template-properties: Unable to insert template, the properties in the template file could not be read.
templates.msg-no-folder-set: Failed to list templates. No template folder configured.

translucency.name: Translucent window
translucency.desc: Turn on translucency effect to enhance a sense of depth. Best used with dark mode. Not supported on Linux.

slash-command.name: Slash commands
slash-command.desc: Enable the ability to trigger slash commands in the editor by typing the forward slash.

editor-status.name: Editor status
editor-status.desc: Adds a status bar item to show and change the current editor mode.

publish.name: Publish
publish.desc: Publish your notes through Obsidian Publish.
publish.label-no-internet-access: You need access to the internet to publish changes.
publish.label-publish-service-description: Obsidian Publish is an add-on paid service that lets you publish your notes online directly from Obsidian.
publish.label-please-login: To start publishing, please log in or create a new Obsidian account.
publish.label-no-publish-subscription: You do not have an Obsidian Publish subscription yet.
publish.label-delete-site-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this site?
publish.label-delete-site-details: This will immediately and permanently delete your site.
publish.option-site-id-description: Your site will be at https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id}. You can change this later. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes are allowed.
publish.msg-invalid-site-id: Site ID can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes.
publish.msg-site-id-in-use: This site ID is in use, please try another one.
publish.msg-create-site-issue: That was an issue when creating your site.
publish.option-site-name-description: Name of your published site. It will show up in the page title of your site.
publish.option-home-page-file-description: The first page the user sees when landing on your published site
publish.option-logo-description: Pick an image file as your site logo.
publish.option-logo-placeholder: Any uploaded image in your vault...
publish.option-customize-navigation-desc: Override the order of navigation items and hide pages or folders from showing.
publish.option-hide-items-in-navigation: Hide pages or folders from navigation
publish.option-hide-items-in-navigation-desc: Right click and select "Hide" to prevent specific pages from appearing in the site navigation. The pages will still be accessible via links or accessing the URL directly.
publish.label-navigation-modal-desc: Drag and drop to customize the order in which navigation items appear on your Publish site.
publish.option-theme-description: Choose default color scheme for your site.
publish.option-show-theme-toggle-description: Let the visitor toggle between light and dark theme on their own.
publish.option-show-navigation-description: Display a list of all published pages on the left side of your published site.
publish.option-show-search-description: Display a search bar at top of the navigation that lets the visitors search pages and headings on your site.
publish.option-show-graph-description: Display a small local graph on each page.
publish.option-show-outline-description: Display the outline of headings on each page.
publish.option-show-backlinks-description: Show backlink section at the end of each page.
publish.option-sliding-window-mode-description: Open pages in new panes to the right. Allows scrolling through panes horizontally.
publish.option-hover-preview-file-description: Display page preview when hovering links.
publish.option-hide-title-description: Hide the page title heading. Useful when you have your own headings at the beginning of each page.
publish.option-readable-line-length-description: Limit maximum line length. Fits less content on the screen, but makes long paragraphs more readable.
publish.option-site-password-description: Restrict access to your site with passwords.
publish.option-google-analytics-description: Configure Google Analytics for your site. Only available for visitors from your custom domain URL. Please check with your local laws and regulations first.
publish.tooltip-add-linked: Add all files that are linked by currently selected items
publish.msg-no-permission-to-publish-to-site: You do not have permission to publish to the current site.
publish.msg-select-at-least-one-file: Please select at least one file.
publish.label-clear-cache: It takes up to a few minutes for the changes to show up on your site. If you do not see your latest changes, try clearing the cache in your browser.
publish.label-visit-site: You can visit your site here:
publish.msg-something-went-wrong: Something went wrong. Please check the developer console for details.
publish.label-no-password: Your site currently does not have any passwords. Anyone can visit it.
publish.label-have-password: Your site is password protected. If you have multiple passwords, visitors can access your site by entering any of them.
publish.option-password-desc: A hash of your password will be stored securely. Once the password is set, it cannot be revealed in plaintext.
publish.option-nickname-desc: Set a nickname to remind yourself what or who the password is for.
publish.option-custom-domain-desc: Use your own domain rather than the https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id} URL.
publish.option-noindex-desc: Prevent search engines from indexing your site.
publish.option-custom-url-desc: The URL that your site will be located at.
publish.option-custom-url-redirect-desc: Redirect visitors on publish.obsidian.md/id to your custom domain.
publish.label-custom-domain-instructions: Please refer to our {{link}} on our help site for more information.
publish.label-sharing-with-users: This site is currently shared with the following people.
publish.label-not-sharing: This site is not currently shared with anyone.
publish.error-email-must-be-valid: Please enter a valid email to invite someone.
publish.msg-enable-publish-plugin: Please enable the Publish core plugin in Settings -> Core plugins to view sites.
publish.label-leave-site-confirmation-details: This will remove this site from the list of sites shared with you. This action cannot be reverted.
publish.label-leave-site-confirmation-details-2: Please contact the owner of the site if you wish to collaborate on this site again.
publish.label-confirm-override-1: Are you sure you want to override the local version?
publish.label-confirm-override-2: The live version will be used and your local version will be discarded. Please make backups if necessary.
publish.message-successfully-used-live-version: Successfully used live version to override your local version.
publish.option-included-folders-desc: Files under these folders will automatically be selected when you review changes to publish.
publish.option-excluded-folders-desc: Files under these folders won't show up when you review changes to publish. This setting takes priority over included folders above.
publish.label-add-included-folder-desc: You can include both existing folders and folders that have not been created yet.

workspaces.name: Workspaces
workspaces.msg-enter-name: Please enter a name for the new layout.

sync.name: Sync
sync.desc: Synchronize your files through Obsidian Sync.
sync.msg-already-latest-version: This version is already the latest version.
sync.label-no-history: No sync history for this file.
sync.label-click-to-see-history: Click on a deleted file to see its history.
sync.label-remote-vault-explanation: Remote vaults securely synchronize your vault between devices.
sync.option-vault-name-desc: Helps you remember what this vault is for.
sync.option-vault-region-desc: Select the server region closest to you to store the remote vault. This cannot be changed in the future.
sync.option-encryption-desc: End-to-end encryption offers the strongest security but requires you to safely store your encryption password. Standard encryption uses a key managed by Obsidian to protect your data in transit and on our servers.
sync.option-encryption-warning: This option cannot be changed later.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc: This password cannot be changed later.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc-warning: If you forget this password, any remote data will remain unusable forever.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc-2: This does not affect your local data.
sync.label-encryption-password-explanation: The remote vault “{{name}}” is currently encrypted. Enter your password to unlock.
sync.label-rename-remote-vault-desc: Enter a new name for this remote vault.
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-questi: Are you sure you want to delete this remote vault?
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-result: All data on our server, including version history, will be deleted. Your local files will stay intact.
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-warnin: This action is permanent and irreversible.
sync.msg-disconnect-from-deleted-vault: Obsidian Sync: The connected remote vault no longer exists.
sync.label-not-remote-vaults: You don't have any remote vaults.
sync.label-no-subscription: You don't have an active Obsidian Sync subscription.
sync.label-third-party-sync-warning-desc: Warning: Your vault seems to be using {{service}} as a third party sync service. If you use Obsidian Sync with this vault, you may run into conflicts, file corruption, or data loss.
sync.label-icloud-drive-warning: If you are using iCloud Drive, your Documents and Desktop folders might be synced by iCloud. This could cause conflicts with Obsidian Sync.
sync.option-remote-vault-desc-connected: Currently connected to the "{{name}}" remote vault.
sync.option-remote-vault-desc-not-connected: Currently not connected to any remote vault.
sync.option-device-name-desc: This name will be displayed in the sync log. Leave empty to use the default name.
sync.option-sync-log-desc: View recent sync activities for debugging.
sync.option-vault-size-unknown: Unable to retrieve your vault size.
sync.msg-largest-files-desc: These are the remote files that are taking the most space. After deleting attachments, use the purge button to free up remote vault space.
sync.tooltip-purge-remote: Permanently purge deleted attachments from remote vault to save space.
sync.option-prevent-sleep-desc: Prevents the device from going to sleep when there are still files to be synced.
sync.option-excluded-folder-desc: Prevent certain folders from being synced.
sync.option-sync-image-desc: Sync image files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-sync-audio-desc: Sync audio files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-sync-video-desc: Sync video files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-view-config-files-desc: View and restore version history of setting files.
sync.option-sync-app-desc: Enable to sync editor settings, files & links settings, custom hotkeys, etc.
sync.option-sync-appearance-desc: Sync appearance settings like dark mode, active theme, and enabled snippets.
sync.option-sync-appearance-data-desc: Sync downloaded themes and snippets. Whether they are enabled depends on the previous setting.
sync.option-sync-core-plugin-desc: Sync which core plugins are enabled.
sync.option-sync-community-plugin-desc: Sync which community plugins are enabled.
sync.option-sync-community-plugin-data-desc: Sync installed community plugins (.js, .css, and manifest.json files) and their settings.
sync.label-sync-introduction: Obsidian Sync is Obsidian's add-on sync service with end-to-end encryption and version history.
sync.label-account-required: To start syncing, please log in or create a new Obsidian account.
sync.label-number-of-folders-excluded: {{folders}} are currently excluded from being synced.
sync.label-add-excluded-folder-desc: You can exclude both existing folders and folders that have not been created yet.
sync.msg-vault-has-notes: Your local vault already contains some notes.
sync.msg-vault-merge-warning: If you connect to the remote vault "{{name}}", notes in your local vault will be merged with notes from your remote vault. In case of conflicts, the most recent version of the note will be preserved.
sync.tooltip-update-setting-on-all-devices: Please update this option and restart app on all the devices where you want it to take effect.
sync.label-sharing-with-users: This remote vault is currently shared with the following people.
sync.label-not-sharing: This remote vault is not currently shared with anyone.
sync.label-leave-vault-confirmation-details: This will remove this vault from the list of vaults shared with you. This action cannot be reverted.
sync.label-leave-vault-confirmation-details-2: Please contact the owner of the vault if you wish to collaborate on this vault again.
sync.label-require-subscription-to-connect: You need an Obsidian Sync subscription to connect to this vault.
sync.option-contact-support-desc: If you run into any issues with Obsidian Sync, please contact us so we can help you out! You can reach us at support@obsidian.md.
sync.label-sync-disconnected: Sync is not connected to a remote vault.
sync.msg-remote-vault-limit-hit: Obsidian Sync lets you create up to 5 remote vaults. In order to create a new remote vault, please remove an existing one.
sync.label-upgrade-vault-encryption-desc: There is a new encryption version available for remote vaults.
sync.msg-recreate-remote-vault: This will delete your remote vault and recreate it with the latest encryption. Local files will not be affected, however your version history will be lost.
sync.msg-migrate-confirmation: Migrating your vault may take some time. You will need to keep Obsidian active on this device to re-upload all your notes and attachments. It is best to do this on your primary device.
sync.msg-migrate-confirmation-size: You have {{size}} of data. Migrating your vault may take some time. You will need to keep Obsidian active on this device to re-upload all your notes and attachments. It is best to do this on your primary device.

file-recovery.name: File recovery
file-recovery.desc: Let you restore recent snapshots to recover from accidental data loss. Snapshots are only saved for Markdown files.
file-recovery.option-interval-description: Minimal interval in minutes between two snapshots.
file-recovery.option-keep-description: Length in days snapshots is kept for.
file-recovery.label-clear-warning: Are you sure you want to delete all snapshots? Note that only snapshots will be removed. All files inside your vault will not be affected.
file-recovery.label-select-file: Please select a file on the left to view snapshots.

note-composer.name: Note composer
note-composer.option-split-replacement-text-descriptio: What to show in place of the selected text after extracting it.
note-composer.option-template-file-description: Template file to use when merging or extracting. Available variables: {{content}}, {{fromTitle}}, {{newTitle}}, {{date:FORMAT}}, e.g. {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}}.
note-composer.command-merge-file: Merge current file with another file...
note-composer.label-confirm-file-merge: Are you sure you want to merge "{{file}}" into "{{destination}}"? "{{file}}" will be deleted.
note-composer.msg-fail-to-fetch-template: Failed to fetch template file: "{{template}}" not found.

web-viewer.name: Web viewer
web-viewer.desc: Open external links to web pages inside Obsidian.
web-viewer.action-clear-data-cookies-desc: May sign you out of websites.
web-viewer.action-clear-data-all-desc: Removes all of the above as well as local storage and active sessions.
web-viewer.label-fail-to-load-desc: Please make sure you have the correct address.
web-viewer.option-open-external-links-desc: Open links in Obsidian rather than the system default.
web-viewer.option-homepage-desc: What page to view when a web viewer is opened
web-viewer.option-saved-markdown-desc: Websites saved as markdown will be placed here.
web-viewer.option-search-engine-desc: Search engine used when searching from the address bar.
web-viewer.option-search-engine-custom-desc: Use %s in place of the query.
web-viewer.option-enable-adblock-desc: If enabled, the filter lists below will be applied to all web viewer tabs.
web-viewer.option-adblock-lists-desc: One ad block list URL per line. Shared by all vaults.
web-viewer.option-adblock-frequency-desc: Days between updating filter lists. 0 indicates disabled. Shared by all vaults.

canvas.name: Canvas
canvas.desc: Arrange and connect notes on an infinite canvas.
canvas.action-create-with-size: Create a card with specific size
canvas.action-drag-to-add-note: Drag to add note from vault
canvas.action-drag-to-add-media: Drag to add media from vault
canvas.label-export-png-desc: Export "{{title}}" with a PNG file with the settings below.
canvas.option-new-canvas-location: Default location for new canvas files
canvas.option-new-canvas-location-description: Where newly created canvas files are placed.
canvas.option-new-canvas-folder-path: Folder to create new canvas files in
canvas.option-new-canvas-folder-path-descriptio: Newly created canvas files will appear under this folder.
canvas.option-snap-to-grid-desc: Snap cards to the background grid when moving and resizing.
canvas.option-snap-to-objects-desc: Snap cards to nearby objects when moving and resizing.
canvas.option-zoom-breakpoint: Zoom threshold for hiding card content
canvas.option-zoom-breakpoint-desc: Lower values will increase performance but hide card content sooner when zooming out.
canvas.option-export-png-show-logo-desc: This will add an Obsidian logo to the bottom left.
canvas.option-export-png-privacy-mode-desc: This will obscure any text on your canvas.
canvas.option-export-png-zoom-desc: A higher zoom will generate a higher resolution image.
canvas.option-export-png-frame-desc: Choose to render the entire canvas or just the current visible viewport.
canvas.label-drag-from-below: Drag from below or double click
canvas.label-longpress: Touch and hold to add / move / select

pdf.action-reveal-in-outline: Reveal page in table of contents

properties.label-invalid-yaml-marker: Syntax error. Your frontmatter is invalid.
properties.label-migration-warning-desc: Are you sure you want to change the type? Some of the data associated with this property key is incompatible.
